metadata.title: CVE-2021-4219 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in ImageMagick. The vulnerability occurs due to improperuse of open functions and leads to a denial of service. This flaw allows anattacker to crash the system.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4219` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
imagemagick-common - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
libmagick++-6.q16-8 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-8 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
libmagickcore-6.q16-6 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
libmagickcore-6.q16-6-extra - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-6 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-6-extra - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
libmagickwand-6.q16-6 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-6 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
perlmagick - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3ubuntu0.22.04.3+esm1').
